segments.text: Excuse me . This chicken doesn't taste right to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How should I know ? It's just kind of cold in the middle . It just doesn't taste right . Do you want to try it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me get that out of your way . Would you like to order something else from the menu ? Or I could bring you another order of chicken if you'd like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Another one ? I don't want another one . Give me something simple . You've got steak , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . How would you like it cooked ?
segments.speaker: S2
